name: When ur in a nightmare and a jumpscare pops up
name_original: When ur in a nightmare and a jumpscare pops up
description:
When ur in a nightmare and a jumpscare pops up is a game developed by Fadeaway899. It was originally released in 2021.
You can play When ur in a nightmare and a jumpscare pops up on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
